scripts.dev: npm run kill-ports && concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.dev:enhanced: npm run kill-ports && concurrently "npm run dev:backend-enhanced" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.kill-ports: lsof -ti:8000 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true && lsof -ti:3000 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.install:all: npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend
scripts.clean: npm run clean:frontend && npm run clean:backend
